Calculator
public class Calculator extends Object
A Class to convert a infix expression to a postfix expression and evaluating postfix expressions

    • ConvertInfixToPostfix

      public String ConvertInfixToPostfix(String infix)
      Method thats in a string input and, using a stack, converts an expression from infix form to postfix form
      Parameters:
      infix - String in infix expression form
      Returns:
      String that contains the expression in postfix form
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a part of the string is not a letter, number or valid operator then a exception will be thrown

    • evaluatePostFix

      public double evaluatePostFix(String postFix)
      Takes a string input in postfix form, obtains a double from evaluating the postfix expression by applying operators to the preceeding numbers
      Parameters:
      postFix - String in postfix expression form
      Returns:
      the resulting number
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a character in the string is not a letter, number or valid operator, throw exception
